meanings.definition: To change the color of something.
meanings.sent1: She is recolouring her bedroom walls with a fresh coat of paint.
meanings.sent2: The artist is recolouring the old black and white photograph to make it colorful.
meanings.sent3: The children had fun recolouring their coloring books with bright crayons.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter recoloured the dull room with joy and happiness.
meanings.sent5: The sunset recoloured the sky with shades of pink and orange.

meanings.definition: The act of adding color to something again.
meanings.sent1: The recolouring of the faded sign made it look brand new.
meanings.sent2: After the recolouring, the painting looked vibrant and fresh.
meanings.sent3: The recolouring of the rainbow made it even more colorful and magical.
meanings.sent4: The recolouring of the garden brought life back to the dull landscape.
meanings.sent5: The recolouring of the old car gave it a modern and stylish appearance.
